Question
========
Look at the mediation model below. If all regressions of the Baron and
Kenny method are performed with the same n, c = 0.31, α = 0.9 and b =
0.2, what is the value of c' ? *Use 2 decimal places*  
  
![](mediation.png)


Solution
========





 *αb* = *c-c*'  
So, 0.9\*0.2 = 0.31 - c' en dus c'=0.13
